text: The ginkgo tree is a genus of trees. There is only one living species, Ginkgo biloba. All the other known species are fossils. Ginkgo biloba is native to China. It is the National tree of China. ==Gallery== Image:Ginkgo biloba in Lucenec2.jpg|A ginkgo tree in Slovakia Image:Ginkgo Stamm.jpg|Closeup of a ginkgo trunk Image:Ginkgo biloba fructification.jpg|Ginkgo seeds == References == Category:Trees Category:Gymnosperms Category:Living fossils Category:Fossil plants Category:National symbols of the People's Republic of China
title: Ginkgo
